get.description: AD Keyword 노출현황 조회 #hidden
Return an AdKeyword of input AdKeywordId.

parameters.name: nccKeywordId
parameters.description: The unique Id of the keyword

parameters.name: nccKeywordId
parameters.description: The unique Id of the keyword.

put.description:
Change the AD Keyword The parameter field, you can enter one of the following: 'userLock', 'bidAmt', 'links', 'inspect' 
- if field is userLock then Adkeyword.userlock is required 
- if field is bidAmt then Adkeywords.bidAmt and Adkeyword.useGroupBidAmt are required
- if field is links then Adkeyword.links is required and links is json-formatted string
- if field is inspect then Adkeyword's status sholud have pendded.

parameters.name: nccKeywordId
parameters.description: The unique Id of the keyword.

put.description:
Change AD Keywords.(fields=userLock, bidAmt, inspect, links) The maximum number of requests is 200.
- if field is userLock then Adkeyword.userlock is required 
- if field is bidAmt then Adkeywords.bidAmt and Adkeyword.useGroupBidAmt are required
- if field is links then Adkeyword.links is required and links is json-formatted string
- if field is inspect then Adkeyword's status sholud have pendded.
Copy AD Keywords to another adgroup  #hidden

ad.example: {"pc":{"final":"http://searchad.naver.com"},"mobile":{"final":"http://m.searchad.naver.com"},"headline":"the first line","description":"the second line of your ad text"}
ad.description: Creative of this instance. This creative's json schema formed by the field 'type'. #required-create #hidden-update

adAttr.description: Bid infomation of this instance. (Required if Shopping Ad) #hidden-create #hidden-response #required-update

customerId.description: The id of the customer containing this ad. #hidden-request

editTm.description: The lastest time when this ad was modified (RFC 3339 datetime). #hidden-request #hidden-create

enable.description: Enable or Pause this ad by the system. 0:'DISABLED', 1:'ENABLED'. #hidden-response #hidden-request

inspectRequestMsg.description: A message for the inspector of the ad values. This field may set when create or update an ad. #optional-create #optional-update

inspectStatus.description: The approval status of this ad. 10:UNDER_REVIEW, 20:APPROVED, 30:PENDING, 40:DISAPPROVED #hidden-create #hidden-request

nccAdgroupId.description: The id of the adgroup containing this ad. #required-create #hidden-update

regTm.description: The time when this ad was created (RFC 3339 datetime). #hidden-request #hidden-create

type.description: Type of this ad (defined by json-schema form). #required-create #hidden-update

userLock.description: Enable or Pause this ad by the user. 0:'ENABLED', 1:'PAUSED'. #optional-update

isOccupiable.description: The occupation status of AD keyword.

contractAmt.description: The contract amt of time contract without vat.

contractAmtWithVat.description: The contract amt of time contract including vat.

color.description: Color of this label. This field is required and should not be null for UPDATE operation.

editTm.description: Time that the label has been updated. (RFC 3339 datetime). #hidden-request

name.description: Name of this label. This field is required and should not be null for UPDATE operation.

regTm.description: Time that the label has been created. (RFC 3339 datetime). #hidden-request

adExtension.description:
The creative of the AD extension
The format of this value is JSON #hidden-request

customerId.description: The unique ID of the customer #hidden-request

inspectStatus.description: The inspect status of the AD extension #hidden-request

mobileChannelId.description: The unique ID of mobile Biz Channel which produces the creative #required-create #hidden-update

nccAdExtensionId.description: The unique ID of the AD extension #hidden-create #required-update

ownerId.description: The unique ID of owner entity which is either campaign or adgroup containing this AD extension #required-create #hidden-update

pcChannelId.description: The unique ID of PC Biz Channel which produces the creative #required-create #hidden-update

periodEndDt.description: The time at which the AD extension ends (RFC 3339 date-time).

periodStartDt.description: The time at which the AD extension starts (RFC 3339 date-time).

regTm.description: Time that the AD extension has been registered (RFC 3339 datetime). #hidden-request

schedule.description:
The schedule of the AD extension
The format of this value is JSON
- Every day and time : null
- Partially applied : {"SUN":16777215,"MON":16777215,"TUE":16777215,"WED":16777215,"THU":16777215,"FRI":16777215,"SAT":16777215}
 - Each key is the day of week and value is the sum of bit operation with hour which is between 0 and 23 #required-create #optional-update

statusReason.description: Status reason of this AD extension #hidden-request

type.description: The type of the AD extension #required-create #hidden-update

usePeriod.description:
use period.  
 true: use, false: unuse  If this field is blank, and then set to the default value(false).

userLock.description: This field can be used for ENABLED or PAUSED of the AD extension #required-create #optional-update

delFlag.description: When you create a new keyword, If this field is blank, and then set to the default value(false). #hidden-request #hidden-response

nccAdgroupId.description: The unique ID of this Ad Group #hidden-create #required-delete

nccAdgroupRestrictKwdId.description: The unique ID of this impression-restricted keyword #hidden-create #required-delete

regTm.description: Time that the keyword has been created. #hidden-request

type.description: Type of the keyword. default value is 'KEYWORD_PLUS_RESTRICT'

adultStatus.description: Adult status of this business channel. #hidden-request

blackStatus.description: Black status of this business channel. #hidden-request

businessInfo.description:
The main data of the business channel.
The format of this value is JSON

channelKey.description: The key information of channel. eg. site type is URL #hidden-create, #hidden-update

customerId.description: The unique ID of the customer #hidden-request

firstChargeTm.description: Time that business channel used for ads. (RFC 3339 datetime). #hidden-request

inspectRequestTm.description: Time that business channel request inspect. (RFC 3339 datetime). #hidden-request

inspectTm.description: Time that business channel inspected. (RFC 3339 datetime). #hidden-request

name.description: Name of this business channel. This field is required and should not be null for ADD operations.

nccBusinessChannelId.description: The unique ID of the business channel #hidden-create #required-update

regTm.description: Time that the business channel has been created. (RFC 3339 datetime). #hidden-request

statusReason.description: Status reason of this business channel. #hidden-create #hidden-update

customerId.description: The unique ID of the customer #hidden-request

editTm.description: Time that the labelRef has been updated. (RFC 3339 datetime). #hidden-request

enable.description: Whether to enable this label reference.

nccLabelId.description: The unique ID of the label

refId.description: ID of reference. The refId value indicates nccAdgroupId or nccAdId or nccKeywordId.

regTm.description: Time that the labelRef has been created. (RFC 3339 datetime). #hidden-request

nccTargetId.description: The unique ID of the target

ownerId.description: The unique ID of owner entity which containing this target

regTm.description: The time at which the target was created (RFC 3339 date-time). #hidden-request

targetTp.description: The type of the targeting. Available values are 'TIME_WEEKLY_TARGET', 'REGIONAL_TARGET', 'MEDIA_TARGET', 'PC_MOBILE_TARGET'.

nccTimeContractItemId.description: The unique ID of the time contract

bidAmt.description: Max CPC (cost per click) bid. At the AD Keyword level. You can enter between 70 to 100000. When you create a new Ad Keyword, If this field is blank, and then set to the default value (70). This field should be used with 'useGroupBidAmt' field. #optional-create #optional-update #optional-update-items  #hidden-uri-managedKeyword

customerId.description: The unique ID of the customer #hidden-request  #hidden-uri-managedKeyword

inspectStatus.description: Inspect status of this AD keyword #hidden-request  #hidden-uri-managedKeyword

nccAdgroupId.description: The unique ID of the adgroup containing this AD Keyword #hidden-create #required-update #required-update-items  #hidden-uri-managedKeyword

nccCampaignId.description: The unique ID of the campaign containing this Ad Keyword #hidden-request  #hidden-uri-managedKeyword

nccKeywordId.description: The unique Id of the keyword #required-update #required-update-items #hidden-create  #hidden-uri-managedKeyword

statusReason.description: Status reason of this Ad Keyword #hidden-request #hidden-uri-managedKeyword

useGroupBidAmt.description: Whether to use adgroup bid amount. This field should be used with 'bidAmt' field. #optional-create #optional-update #optional-update-items  #hidden-uri-managedKeyword

userLock.description: This field can be used for ENABLED or PAUSED of the AD keyword. #optional-create  #optional-update #optional-update-items  #hidden-uri-managedKeyword

code.description: Registration failed when the error code. #hidden-request

message.description: Registration failed when the error message. #hidden-request

adgroupAttrJson.description: adgroup attribute json. The 'media' and 'templateId' properties are required if the campaign type is 'BRAND_SEARCH', and the 'media' property can have values 'PC' and 'MOBILE'. The 'contentsType' property is required if the campaign type is 'POWER_CONTENTS'. The 'contentsType' property can have the values 'INFORMATION' and 'PRODUCT'. #optional-create #hidden-update

bidAmt.description: Max CPC (cost per click) bid. At the Ad group level, this represents the default bid applicable for keywords in this Ad Group. You can enter between 70 to 100000. When you create a new Ad Group, If this field is blank, and then set to the default value (70). #required-update

budgetLock.description: Daily budget status of this AdGroup.

contentsNetworkBidAmt.description: Max CPC (cost per click) bid used in contents networks. You can enter between 70 to 100000. When you create a new Ad Group, If this field is blank, and then set to the default value.(70). This field isn't use to Adgroup of Shopping campaign type. #required-update

customerId.description: The unique ID of the customer. #required-create #hidden-request

dailyBudget.description: The maximum budget of the use of the Ad Group during the day. You can enter between 70 to 1000000000. When you create a new Ad Group, If this field is blank, and then set to the default value.(0). #required-update

keywordPlusWeight.description: Bids weights for keyword-plus of the Ad Group. You can enter between 1 to 9999. When you create a new Ad Group, If this field is blank, and then set to the default value.(100). This field isn't use to Adgroup of Shopping campaign type. #required-update

mobileChannelId.description: The unique ID of the mobile buisness channel containing this Ad Group. If necessary this ad group will need to enter the ID of the type of case belong to the campaign "SITE" type of channel type of web site, enter the ID of the channel type of case "MALL" type belonging to the shopping kind of campaign there is. #required-create

mobileNetworkBidWeight.description: Bids weights used in mobile networks. You can enter between 10 to 500. When you create a new Ad Group, If this field is blank, and then set to the default value.(100). #required-update

name.description: Name of this Ad Group. This field is required and should not be null for ADD operations. #required-create

nccAdgroupId.description: The unique ID of this Ad Group #hidden-create #required-update

nccCampaignId.description: The unique ID of the campaign with which this Ad Group is associated. #required-create

pcChannelId.description: The unique ID of the pc buisness channel containing this Ad Group. If necessary this ad group will need to enter the ID of the type of case belong to the campaign "SITE" type of channel type of web site, enter the ID of the channel type of case "MALL" type belonging to the shopping kind of campaign there is. #required-create

pcNetworkBidWeight.description: Bids weights used in PC networks. You can enter between 10 to 500. When you create a new Ad Group, If this field is blank, and then set to the default value.(100) #required-update

regTm.description: Time that the Ad Group has been created. (RFC 3339 datetime). #hidden-request

statusReason.description: Status reason of this Ad Group #hidden-request

targets.description: Each targeting information in the Ad Group. When you create a new Ad Group, If this field is blank, and then set to the default targetting

useCntsNetworkBidAmt.description: Whether to use separate bids for the content network. When you create a new Ad Group, If this field is blank, and then set to the default value.(false). This field isn't use to Adgroup of Shopping campaign type. #required-update

useDailyBudget.description: Whether to use maximum budget of a day of the Ad Group. When you create a new Ad Group, If this field is blank, and then set to the default value.(false) #required-update

useKeywordPlus.description: Whether to use keyword-plus of the Ad Group. When you create a new Ad Group, If this field is blank, and then set to the default value.(false). This field isn't use to Adgroup of Shopping campaign type. #required-update

userLock.description: This field can be used for ENABLED or PAUSED of the Ad Group. When you create a new Ad Group, If this field is blank, and then set to the default value.(false) #required-update

currentTimeContract.description: The current time contract of adgroup. The status of current time contract is either 'ON_EXPOSING' or 'UPCOMING_CANCEL'

nccAdgroupId.description: The unique ID of the adgroup containing time contract

waitingCount.description: The count of waiting exposure time contract

customerId.description: The unique ID of the customer #required-create #required-update  #hidden-request

dailyBudget.description: The maximum budget of the use of the campaign during the day. If this field is blank, and then set to the default value.(0). #hidden-update

deliveryMethod.description:
choosing 'Accelerated' or 'Standard' ad delivery.  The default value is 'ACCELERATED'.  
 Available values are 'ACCELERATED', 'STANDARD'   #hidden-update

name.description: Name of this campaign. This field is required and should not be null for ADD operations. #required-create  #hidden-update

nccCampaignId.description: The unique ID of the campaign  #hidden-create #required-update

periodEndDt.description: The time at which the campaign ends (RFC 3339 date-time). #hidden-update

periodStartDt.description: The time at which the campaign starts (RFC 3339 date-time). #hidden-update

regTm.description: The time at which the campaign was created (RFC 3339 date-time). #hidden-request

trackingMode.description: The type of the conversion tracking. Available values are 'TRACKING_DISABLED', 'AUTO_TRACKING_MODE', 'PASS_THROUGH_SITE_MODE'. If this field is blank, and then set to the default value(TRACKING_DISABLED). #hidden-update

trackingUrl.description: The value which indicates an URL of the intermediate site used by customer for the purpose of conversion tracking. #hidden-update

useDailyBudget.description:
Whether to use maximum budget of a day of the campaign. If this field is blank, and then set to the default value.(false)  
 true: use, false: unuse #hidden-update

usePeriod.description:
use period.  
 true: use, false: unuse  If this field is blank, and then set to the default value(false).  #hidden-update

userLock.description: This field can be used for ENABLED or PAUSED of the campaign. When you create a new campaign, If this field is blank, and then set to the default value.(false)  #required-update

cancelLoginId.description: The login ID of cancelling time contract.

cancelStatus.description: The cancel status of time contract.

cancelTm.description: Time that the time contract has been cancelled (RFC 3339 datetime).

contractAmt.description: The contract amt of time contract without vat.

contractEndDt.description: The time at which the time contract ends (RFC 3339 date-time).

contractLoginId.description: The login ID of creating time contract.

contractQc.description: Max sum qc of time contract

contractStartDt.description: The time at which the time contract starts (RFC 3339 date-time).

customerId.description: The unique ID of the customer

exposureEndDt.description: The time at which the time contract exposure ends (RFC 3339 date-time).

exposureStartDt.description: The time at which the time contract exposure starts (RFC 3339 date-time).

nccAdgroupId.description: The unique ID of the adgroup containing this time contract

nccTimeContractId.description: The unique ID of the time contract

paymentAmt.description: The payment amt of time contract including vat.

refundAmt.description: The refund amt of time contract including vat.

regTm.description: Time that the AD extension has been registered (RFC 3339 datetime).

totalKeywordQc.description: Current sum qc of time contract

nonRefundableAmt.description: The nonRefundable amt of time contract

refundAmt.description: The refund amt of time contract including vat

refundableAmt.description: The refundable amt of time contract

enable.description: The enable status of time contract item

nccTimeContractId.description: The unique ID of the time contract

nccTimeContractItemId.description: The unique ID of the time contract item

regTm.description: Time that the time contract item has been registered (RFC 3339 datetime).
